title: Property Purchase Loan - LAI00001774

title: Property Development Loan - LAI00001773
description: Loan to assist the borrower with a development of a residential dwelling in the county of Lancashire which will be as our security. Term: to 23/07/2026

title: Refinance Loan LAI00001761
description: New loan to repay existing Folk2Folk loan with the additional £5,000 for upfront fees. Secured on Land and buildings in Bideford which consists of a 4 bedroom barn conversion with a 1 bedroom annex attached. Term 3 years.

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001769
description: New loan to repay existing Folk2Folk loan of £55k plus the additional £10k for set up costs. And a further £15k for building works already completed. Secured on 0.74 acres development site with planning permission for 3 x 4-bed detached dwellings. Term: 2 years.

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001767
description: New loan to repay existing loan of £154k plus the additional is for F2F to retain 18 months interest and fees, plus set up costs and an outstanding tax bill which is due to the previous sale to F2F, secured on 150 acres across 2 sites including a thatched farmhouse, and a range of outbuildings. Term: 18 months

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001766
description: Refinancing existing Folk2Folk Loan. Development site with planning permission for 6 luxury apartments with sea views. Term: 2 years

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001757
description: Loan to refinance of some existing business finance, the security is a couple of parcels of land totalling 83 acres, near Exeter Devon. Term: 5 years

title: Property Purchase Loan - LAI00001754
description: Loan to purchase freehold of 15th Century Inn in Devon, securing their future and which the borrower is currently trading from and leasing. The said property will be security. Term: 5 years.

title: Business Expansion Loan - LAI00001752
description: Further advance to assist with overall improvement of the site in the county of Lincolnshire which FOLK2FOLK have a charge over. Term: to 28/03/2026

title: Refinance Loan LAI-00001762
description: New loan to repay existing Folk2Folk loan of £105,000, with an additional £5,000 to cover fees, secured on 12.5 acres of pastureland. Term 2 years.

title: Business Expansion Loan - LAI00001758
description: Loan to assist the borrower Dalston Hall Properties Ltd to release equity from the property which will be our security located in the county of Cumbria. Term: 5 years.

title: Property Development Loan - LAI00001759
description: Existing borrower requesting funds to assist with the next phase of the build of three dwellings, these plots also make up the security. Near Holsworthy, Devon. Term to end November 2025.

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001760
description: New loan to repay existing Folk2Folk loan of £500,000 secured on a Farm. This consists of a farmhouse, 2 barns and 1.6 acres of land. Term 1 year.

title: Business Expansion Loan - LAI00001764
description: Loan to assist with the expansion of the milking herd and settle some current unsecured debt. The security is 147 acres, farmhouse and buildings, in West Yorkshire. Term: to 08.02.2027

title: Refinance Loan LAI-00001761
description: New loan to repay existing Folk2Folk loan with the existing £5,000 fpr upfront fees, secured on Land and Buildings in Bideford whch is a 4 - bedroom barn conversion with a 1 - bedroom annex attached. 3 year term.

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001765
description: Loan for renewal of maturing F2F loan, secured on farmhouse, buildings and land, Staffordshire. Term: 18 months

title: Property Purchase LAI-00001756

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001755
description: Refinance of an existing FOLK2FOLK loan, the security is a six-bedroomed hotel with owners’ accommodation and annexe. Term: 5 years

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001753
description: Refinance loan of £345,000 to repay existing Folk2Folk loan of £330,000 plus additional £15,000 set up costs. Security includes residential property, barns, lodges and outbuildings and 20 acres of land. Term: 2 years
